name: Integumentary System
short_description: The body's outer protective layer, consisting of skin, hair, and nails.
author: Dr. Sarah Johnson

name: Skeletal System
short_description: The framework of bones and cartilage providing support and protection.
author: Dr. Michael Rodriguez

name: Muscular System
short_description: Responsible for movement and maintaining posture.
author: Dr. Amanda Williams

name: Nervous System
short_description: Controls and coordinates body activities, including sensation and communication.
author: Dr. Benjamin Taylor

name: Circulatory System
short_description: Transports oxygen, nutrients, and hormones throughout the body.
author: Dr. Olivia Martinez

name: Respiratory System
short_description: Facilitates the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide in the lungs.
author: Dr. Christopher Brown

name: Digestive System
short_description: Processes food and absorbs nutrients to provide energy for the body.
author: Dr. Emma White

name: Excretory System
short_description: Eliminates waste products from the body to maintain a healthy internal environment.
author: Dr. Daniel Lee

name: Endocrine System
short_description: Regulates body functions through the release of hormones.
author: Dr. Sophia Garcia

name: Immune System
short_description: Defends the body against pathogens and foreign substances.
author: Dr. Robert Kim

name: Reproductive System
short_description: Responsible for the production of offspring and continuation of the species.
author: Dr. Emily Anderson
